title: So Tahm is completely fking broken ~ God Only Corki
body:
Skarner ulti on W, TF ulti on R, except he can take two people LOL. 

E is absolutley insane, he can gain a shield for 100% of the damage he's taken recently, not to mention it's a constant heal passively.

Q is probs his weakest ability and it's a fking ranged stun (after a few AA's)  LOL

replies.body: At this stage you can't judge.

1. He can only W an enemy champion after he applies 3 stacks of his passive on them.
2. He suffers a 95% movespeed slow while carrying an enemy champion.
3. It lasts 2-3 seconds so youre not really going to be carrying them far without outside mobility such as thresh w, bard e, kalista ult etc.
4. Tahm can choose between either the shield for 100% of recent damage or heal for a percentage of the damage hes taken recently,
5. The shield decays over 4 seconds.
6. Elise E is a ranged stun but we don't cry about that do we?
7. That ult is fun as fk to use, I can't wait to play him.

He loses all of the heal for the shield

The heal is also delayed

His w requires 3 stacks to use on enemies

His ult is slow

His q is only a stun if he aa's 3 times on the same champ (poke friendly)

He could also be the biggest troll and eat teammates to kill them

Maybe, as I said he is going to get steamrolled by nerfs in upcoming patches.

It won't last but for now, yeah he is
